p: The recombinant baculovirus rBac-N-G, which contains the RVFV Gn, Gc and N proteins, was constructed in a previous study ( 9). A suspension of Sf9 insect cells ( Spodoptera frugiperda Sf9 cells) was preserved by the Laboratory of Animal Virology and Special Animal Lemology at the Military Veterinary Research Institute in China; these cells were cultivated per a previously described method ( 9).
